quest.name: Sacred Sweeping
journal: Ujin needs help if she is to do what the gods ask of her.
objectives: Survey the land for gaunt gedan.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: Tell me, are you an experienced hunter?

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: I was told today that I need to go and clean the altar to the west. However, when I visited the area earlier, it was surrounded by beasts.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: Please go to Chakha Zoh and slay any gaunt gedan you find. I cannot complete my duties without your help.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: Please go to Chakha Zoh and slay any gaunt gedan you find.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: You have already slayed the creatures? It seems I made the right decision asking you for help.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: Thank you for everything, kind adventurer.

dialogue.name: UJIN
dialogue.text: Please take this as a token of my thanks. I am currently training to be an udgan myself, though I am still lacking in experience. I look forward to the day when I am able to pray for you.
